Meanwhile Jasmine deliberately lets Sam treat her t o a fancy dinner, pretending to believe in his rich ...

186.title: Episode #1.186
186.plot: Jens is surprised how jealous Ella reacts when told he bumped into his ex Lotte, now a nursing apprentice, but gets both girls to agree to a trio date. Anthony's stage-dive ended with a dislocated shoulder and ridicule from the gang. Lucas makes him apologize before patching up shoulder and friendships.

187.title: Episode #1.187
187.plot: Jens reassures Ella, who can't come to his ma's exhibition, by requesting another revalidation nurse then his ex Lotte. Nicholas can't make up his mind whether to inform the press Clio is carrying his child and decides to sell the Mona Flora. The police questions Clio about the diamond's theft but has to release her again for lack of proof. Stckmans and his assistant arrive to inspect the clinic's hygiene. Frederico cat rid of all the dirt, but Sam plants a syringe and bandage under a patient's bed.

188.title: Episode #1.188
188.plot: Jens isn't amused that his ex Lotte turns up at his ma's festive exhibition opening. Lucas brought Anthony along, who can't resist calling Cindy, but she's overheard bu Ella, who rushes over to make a spectacle of herself. To avoid Jasmine 'discovering' he's an inspector, Sam buys Norbert's discretion with a clean report for the clinic, only to learn afterward he was set up from the start. Nicholas can't stand the bickering between Linda and Cloe, who secretly enjoys her enemy loosing his support.

189.title: Episode #1.189
189.plot: Jens proves Ella's insecurity absurd by turning up for dinner with Norbert. Lucas discovers Clio is the patient meals thief. When the police organizes a lineup for the diamond's fence, Norbert convinces Clio to confess. Nicholas is furious to see his child's mother jailed and hopes to liberate her quickly by marrying her. Anthony is back to normal.

190.title: Episode #1.190
190.plot: During revalidation tests and afterward in the clinic's park, Jens politely resists Lotte's blatant seduction attempts, which spy Carmen can't quit work out. Lucas damages his trusted suit, so Anthony sees his chance to design a hip new one for his lover. Nicolas asks Clio's hand from surprised Norbert and makes his engagement public.

191.title: Episode #1.191
191.plot: Jens makes no fuzz about being inadvertently called 'dearest Nicholas' during a kiss and has a marvelous graduation present: a trip for two, courtesy of his parents. Lucas worries about Anthony's design 'originality'. Nicholas hears from the detective the diamond investigation is closed, not Clio's case. Norbert refuses to help her sneakily. Lotte is tricked into a nocturnal surprise.

192.title: Episode #1.192
192.plot: After her last exam, Ella dreams of nursing and starts doubting if her love with Jens is really more then magnified gratitude and bonding at his comatose sick-bed. Jens is ready to book their trip, but she drops everything when Norbert reports to them, after worried-sick Nicholas, Clio needs unspecified medical help in jail. Linda can't handle her daughter revealing herself as such.

193.title: Episode #1.193
193.plot: Ella rudely left Jens to run to prison infirmary for Clio, who's actually all right and asks Norbert in vain to get her out of jail by calling markers. Jens goes on booking a Moroccan holiday and prepares a champagne graduation drink with his parents. Yet she can't forget the kiss she stole from Nicholas, dreams of passion with him again and runs off. Lucas discovers Anthony is designing presentable outfits and makes up with a surprise performance in the karaoke contest manifold winner Anthony is nos the celebrity juror in.

194.title: Episode #1.194
194.plot: Jens is shocked that Ella cruelly dumps him, based solely on vague doubts if their love isn't 'just grown from' compassion and gratitude. Norbert's joy over Clio's release from prison for lack of proof and Nicholas's acceptance of her suggestion to get married next Friday in private is soon wrecked by discovering proof she's hiding a negative paternity test since weeks. Lucas's design-suit-approval brings him back in lovers mode with Anthony. Frederico isn't ready to reconcile with Jasmine.

195.title: Episode #1.195
195.plot: Jens visits the gang, just to tell Ella he accepts becoming just friends again. Norbert wakes up with a bruised head in a basement, locked up with the fired police detective, who explains he's Clio's baby's father. Nicholas accepts to go with the wedding and believes Clio's lie Norbert visits a gravely ill (imaginary) Austrian cousin.

196.title: Episode #1.196
196.plot: Norbert screws up his and the detective's opportunity to escape and lets Clio force him to tell Nicholas over the phone 'from Austria' to go ahead with the wedding, so Lucas is the new best man, and to name Clio Norbert's stand-in as clinic manager. Frederico follows on one of Clio's lies. Ella accepts Clio's offer to spend three years as a Red Cross volunteer on nursing training in South Africa.

197.title: Episode #1.197
197.plot: The detective's wrestle for the gun with Clio only left him hand-shot. Norbert is allowed to get medical supplies, but on the way Clio looses the baby-phone she used to monitor the basement 'cell'. The cleaning crew finds it but the batteries wear down before Norbert van explain why they must be aware of Clio. The gang is mobilized, except Ella, who prepares her departure to South Africa and says goodbye to Nicolas and Dr. Arendts. Frederico nearly makes up with Jasmine.

198.title: Finale
198.plot: Norbert and the ex-cop are found and liberated, but Clio has flown. Without bothering, Ella leaves on her three year nurse training. Three years later, she's back, like reunited Frederico and Jasmine, who finally made their tandem 'world tour'. Jens is over her completely, unlike Nicolas, who became a grim recluse. Suddenly he realizes he has another shot, makes a romantic proposal and has a bride. Dr. Arentds works out her father's aristocratic family from dad's pen name. A lottery win changes more lives.

imdb.plot outline: Years ago, a late nurse's young daughter, Ella, was discredited with stepfather Norbert by his wicked daughter Clio and send off to and exploited by her aunt 'tarantula', her only comfort being the friendship of young Jens. Once 18, Ella leaves and ends up in Lier, where Dr. Norbert is running a private clinic owned by recluse Nicolas De Prins's family. Intrigues abound long before Ella meets and recognizes either relative, her mysterious dad or Jens, who ends up comatose after chasing her. Meanwhile Ella made new friends and moved in with a loony hairdresser and her gay deputy Anthony.
imdb.title: Ella
plot: Years ago, a late nurse's young daughter, _Ella_ (qv), was discredited with stepfather Norbert by his wicked daughter Clio and send off to and exploited by her aunt 'tarantula', her only comfort being the friendship of young Jens. Once 18, _Ella_ (qv) leaves and ends up in Lier, where Dr. Norbert is running a private clinic owned by recluse Nicolas De Prins's family. Intrigues abound long before _Ella_ (qv) meets and recognizes either relative, her mysterious dad or Jens, who ends up comatose after chasing her. Meanwhile _Ella_ (qv) made new friends and moved in with a loony hairdresser and her gay deputy Anthony.::KGF Vissers
synopsis:
De achtjarige Ella woont samen met haar mama in een gezellig rijhuisje. Als alleenstaande moeder heeft Tessa het niet breed, maar ze gaat door het vuur om de kleine Ella een gelukkige jeugd te geven. Wanneer Ella door dyslexie leerproblemen krijgt op school, helpt ze haar dochter spelenderwijs haar achterstand wegwerken. De toekomst lijkt Ella en haar mama gunstig gezind, zeker wanneer Tessa zich verlooft met Norbert, de directeur van privékliniek De Wingerd, waar Tessa als verpleegster werkt.Fataal ongeluk
Maar dan slaat het noodlot toe. Kort voor het huwelijk met Norbert krijgt Tessa een fataal ongeluk. Op haar sterfbed laat ze Norbert zweren dat hij altijd voor Ella zal zorgen, alsof het zijn eigen dochter is.Het vuile werk
In eerste instantie houdt Norbert zijn belofte en Ella trekt bij hem in. Maar Norberts dochter Clio is niet opgezet met de komst van Ella en zet alles op alles om haar zo snel mogelijk buiten te werken. Clio weet haar ietwat naïeve vader sluw te bespelen en wanneer er brand uitbreekt in Ellas slaapkamer, lijkt haar lot bezegeld. Norbert dumpt Ella bij tante Ursula, die een frituur uitbaat op een camping. Zij vertelt aan Norbert dat ze een echte kindervriend is, maar ze wil Ella enkel gebruiken om het vuile werk te doen in de frituur. Ursula vindt het niet belangrijk dat Ella leert lezen en schrijven. Als ze maar kan werken.'Geluk maak je zelf'
De jaren gaan voorbij en op haar achttiende herinnert Ella zich de woorden van haar moeder: Geluk maak je zelf. Ze pakt haar rugzak en trekt naar de stad waar het leven voor haar begon. s Nachts doolt ze door de straten en steelt ze eten in een nachtwinkel. Wat Ella niet beseft is dat de jongen van de nachtwinkel haar achterna is gelopen en in een diepe coma geraakt nadat hij wordt aangereden door een auto. Plots belandt ze bij het huisje waar ze vroeger met haar mama woonde. Intussen werd de buurt opgewaardeerd en is het een trendy kapsalonnetje geworden.Excentrieke Anthony
s Morgens wordt Ella er gevonden door kapster Cindy. Samen met de excentrieke Anthony baat zij het kapsalon uit. Hier start een nieuw hoofdstuk in het leven van Ella.
Ondertussen komt Norbert te weten dat Ella niet langer op de camping woont. Hij leefde in de veronderstelling dat Ella er gelukkig was, maar vangt nu tegenstrijdige berichtenop. Zijn zoektocht naar de waarheid kan beginnen, tot grote ergernis van Clio
